languages.text: "Также я искренне благодарю за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}спасение моей прислуги{/d}, особенно камердинера. Уве прослужил на станции более пяти лет — много дольше, чем прочие до него. Он знает, как правильно прислуживать мне во время путешествий сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериум{/g} и что подавать на завтрак. Его присутствие... окутывает меня пеленой янтаря".

traits.locale_text: "Также я искренне благодарю за спасение моей прислуги, особенно камердинера. Уве прослужил на станции более пяти лет — много дольше, чем прочие до него. Он знает, как правильно прислуживать мне во время путешествий сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериум{/g} и что подавать на завтрак. Его присутствие... окутывает меня пеленой янтаря".

languages.text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."
languages.original_text: "Также я искренне благодарю за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}спасение моей прислуги{/d}, особенно камердинера. Уве прослужил на станции более пяти лет — много дольше, чем прочие до него. Он знает, как правильно прислуживать мне во время путешествий сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериум{/g} и что подавать на завтрак. Его присутствие... окутывает меня пеленой янтаря".

traits.locale_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you saved my servants, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

"I am also deeply grateful that you saved my servants, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

"I am also deeply grateful that you saved my servants, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

"I am also deeply grateful that you saved my servants, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

languages.text: “我也同样深深地感激你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}拯救了我的仆人们{/d}，尤其是我的贴身男仆乌维。他在星站侍奉了我五年，比他之前的人都照顾得更久。他知道在穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的旅途中该如何恰当地照顾我，以及应该为我准备怎样的早餐。他就像一件……琥珀色的斗篷一样，将我包裹其中。”
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: “我也同样深深地感激你拯救了我的仆人们，尤其是我的贴身男仆乌维。他在星站侍奉了我五年，比他之前的人都照顾得更久。他知道在穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的旅途中该如何恰当地照顾我，以及应该为我准备怎样的早餐。他就像一件……琥珀色的斗篷一样，将我包裹其中。”

languages.text: 「また、あたくしの使用人、特に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}付き人を助けてくれた{/d}ことにも深く感謝しております。ウベは他の誰よりも長く、5年以上もこのステーションに勤務しているのです。彼は、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}を移動する際に、どのようにあたくしを世話すればよいのか、朝食に何を出せばよいのかを知っています。彼の存在は…あたくしを琥珀色の帳で包んでくれるようなものです」
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: 「また、私の使用人、特に付き人を助けてくれたことにも深く感謝しています。ウベは他の誰よりも長く、5年以上もこのステーションに勤務しているのです。彼は、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}を移動する際に、どのように私を世話すればよいのか、朝食に何を出せばよいのかを知っています。彼の存在は…私を琥珀色の帳で包んでくれるようなものです」

「また、あたくしの使用人、特に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}付き人を助けてくれた{/d}ことにも深く感謝しております。ウベは他の誰よりも長く、5年以上もこのステーションに勤務しているのです。彼は、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}を移動する際に、どのようにあたくしを世話すればよいのか、朝食に何を出せばよいのかを知っています。彼の存在は…あたくしを琥珀色の帳で包んでくれるようなものです」

languages.text: "Ich bin außerdem sehr dankbar dafür, dass ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}meine Diener gerettet habt{/d}, vor allem meinen Kammerdiener. Uve hat über fünf Jahre auf der Station gearbeitet – länger als alle seine Vorgänger. Er weiß, was ich während der Reisen durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} benötige und was ich zum Frühstück will. Seine Anwesenheit ... umschließt mich in Bernstein."
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin außerdem sehr dankbar dafür, dass ihr meine Diener gerettet habt, vor allem meinen Kammerdiener. Uve hat über fünf Jahre auf der Station gearbeitet – länger als alle seine Vorgänger. Er weiß, was ich während der Reisen durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} benötige und was ich zum Frühstück will. Seine Anwesenheit ... umschließt mich in Bernstein."

languages.text: « Je vous suis également reconnaissante d'avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}sauvé mes serviteurs{/d}, en particulier mon valet. Uve était en poste à la station depuis plus de cinq ans, bien plus longtemps que tous ceux qui l'ont précédé. Il sait parfaitement comment m'assister lors des voyages dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} ou ce qu'il faut me servir au petit déjeuner. Sa présence... m'enveloppe d'un manteau d'ambre. »
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous suis également reconnaissante d'avoir sauvé mes serviteurs, en particulier mon valet. Uve était en poste à la station depuis plus de cinq ans, bien plus longtemps que tous ceux qui l'ont précédé. Il sait parfaitement comment m'assister lors des voyages dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} ou ce qu'il faut me servir au petit déjeuner. Sa présence... m'enveloppe d'un manteau d'ambre. »

languages.text: «También le estoy muy agradecida por {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}salvar a mis sirvientes{/d}, especialmente a mi ayuda de cámara. Uve lleva en el cargo más de cinco años, mucho más que ninguno de sus predecesores. Sabe ayudarme debidamente en los viajes por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g} y lo que me gusta desayunar. Su presencia... es como una capa de ámbar».
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: «También le estoy muy agradecida por salvar a mis sirvientes, especialmente a mi ayuda de cámara. Uve lleva en el cargo más de cinco años, mucho más que ninguno de sus predecesores. Sabe ayudarme debidamente en los viajes por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g} y lo que me gusta desayunar. Su presencia... es como una capa de ámbar».

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}Hizmetkârlarımı, özellikle de şahsi uşağımı kurtardığın{/d} için de ayrıca minnettarım. Uve, istasyonda beş yıldan uzun süre hizmet etti ki öncesinde bu kadar uzun süre kalabilen olmamıştı. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g} yolculuklarımda benimle nasıl alakadar olunacağını ve kahvaltıda neler yediğimi iyi bilir. Onun varlığı beni... Kehribar rengi bir pelerinle sarmalıyor."
languages.original_text: "I am also deeply grateful that you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaServantsSaved}saved my servants{/d}, especially my valet. Uve served on the station for more than five years — much longer than any who preceded him. He knows how to properly attend to me during journeys through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} and what to serve me for breakfast. His presence... envelops me in a cloak of amber."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarımı, özellikle de şahsi uşağımı kurtardığın için de ayrıca minnettarım. Uve, istasyonda beş yıldan uzun süre hizmet etti ki öncesinde bu kadar uzun süre kalabilen olmamıştı. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g} yolculuklarımda benimle nasıl alakadar olunacağını ve kahvaltıda neler yediğimi iyi bilir. Onun varlığı beni... Kehribar rengi bir pelerinle sarmalıyor."
